data.description: Explores higher education curriculum including academic program philosophy and design, planning and development, program innovations, liberal education, academic majors, graduate and professional education, program review and evaluation.

data.title: GOVERNANCE AND ADMINISTRATION OF COLLEGES AND UNIVERSITIES
